description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface, utilizing Google Mock (ake) for unit testing purposes. It includes mock methods corresponding to the interface's functions, and references configuration headers and Google Mock library. The class is used to simulate plugin shell behaviors in tests.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface for testing purposes, providing mocked methods for all interface functions.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns a string representing the version information.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Retrieves the locator string.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name string.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign string.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix string.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns the configuration line string.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns the persistent storage path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns the volatile storage path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns the data path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported based on the input parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the sub-systems interface.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with an ID and a JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with event and data strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign and ID.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification interface.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification interface.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model string.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if the service is running in background mode.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns the accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path for proxy stubs.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns the hash key string.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs string substitution.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the current reason code.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overload)
methods.description: Configures the service with a configuration string.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns the system root path.

methods.name: SystemRootPath (overload)
methods.description: Returns the system root path for a given string.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns the system path.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns the plugin path.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns or sets the start mode.

methods.name: Resumed (HRESULT)
methods.description: Reports resumed state as an HRESULT.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Retrieves metadata information.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernate with a specified reason code.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Returns library search paths for a given string.
